articles.description: In an attempt to expand AR beauty features for more users, Google is now introducing Augmented Reality AR beauty features on mobile internet browsers. According to The Keyword blog post from Google, other than lips, eyes and foundation, the new AR category of…
articles.content: Google, a California-based tech giant, introduced its AR beauty features around three years ago to let shoppers zero down on a choice to buy products easily. In an attempt to further expand this feat… [+1833 chars]
